Though I frequently fly the flag for individuality, there are certain staples that every guy needs should he want to build a reliable, long-lasting wardrobe. Amongst those is the white shirt. From days in the office to weddings and graduation ceremonies, the best white dress shirts for men are the perfect blank canvas for just about any life event. Which is why it pays to invest in a great one (or three). To help, I’ve spent the past few weeks searching for the cream of the crop—the undisputed closet champions that can be dressed up or down and paired with a plethora of suit and tie options. Keep reading to discover what I found. Key Takeaways The ultimate foundational piece, the white dress shirt is one of the most timeless styles a man can own. A must-have regardless of sartorial preference or career, it’s the type of shirt that’ll take you from Monday morning meetings to weekend drinks and everything in between. To find the best white dress shirts for men, I scoured the internet, rounding up trusted brands and reading ratings and reviews before settling on seven standout styles, including options from Savile Row Company and Luca Faloni. This one is made from a crisp, easy-to-iron cotton fabric that washes well and gets softer after every wear. If you need a do-it-all shirt that can be worn at weddings, work events, and weekends, then this versatile design hits the mark. Who is this for? A versatile design that can be worn tucked in or out, this feels a touch more relaxed than some of the other shirts on this list, making it an excellent choice for every day. Flaws but not deal-breakers: Though the cotton fabric is breathable, the brushed effect does trap in the heat, which means that it might get a little stuffy during particularly hot days. This one, however, definitely is. Given five stars for its fit, quality, and comfort, the Amazon bestseller is hard to beat. This means that you might find that the collar starts to curl after a few wears – which you’ll need to fix with an iron should you not want to become known as the curly collar guy. Turns out they also have one of the best white dress shirts for men. Given the five-star thumbs-up by thousands of Amazon customers, it’s loved for its comfort, quality, and value for money. Fabric The fabric of a dress shirt is crucial for both comfort and functionality. Cotton, because of its breathability and softness, is the most versatile and easy to care for. Style The best men’s white dress shirts come in various designs, from tuxedo shirts to business styles, each with unique features that complement different occasions and personal tastes.
